code_repairing_2:
I was able to identify the memory leak in the provided code by analyzing the line of code that was flagged as an issue.

The line of code that was flagged as an issue is:

m_textMeshPro.SetText(label, m_frame % 1000);

The method SetText(string text, float arg0, float arg1, float arg2) is allocating a new string on every call, which can be a memory-intensive operation and lead to performance issues in large applications.

Instead of calling this method every frame, you can cache the result of the call and use it instead:

string result = m_text
